column4: WIll dapper get Gnome 2.16 when it is released or will that go into the next version of Ubuntu?
2.14.1 gnome is runing in my dapper
True but the devel version of Gnome due in Sept is 2.15 (to be 2.16) .  I just wonder if an upgrade will be available to Dapper or will it be in the next Ubuntu release.
seeing as the next ubuntu release shold be in october i would guess that it would be in the next release
